message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but I'm only willing to pay $100 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though - I can sell it to you for $110.
